content.json: SAP Security Audit log and Initial Access --- This workbook uses the following data sources: * SAP Audit Log * SAP User Master Data * Sentinel Incidents and Alerts * Azure AuditLogs (optional) * Azure SignIn Activity (optional) Use the parameters below to select subscription scope, timerange and relevant SAP systems. Note that this workbook supports a scenario where different workspaces are used for SAP and azure activity and sigin logs.

parameters.name: InternalWSs
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| take 1
| parse IncidentUrl with * "/workspaces/" Workspace "/" *
| project Workspace

parameters.name: InternalSub
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| where name contains "{InternalWSs}"
| take 10
| project subscriptionId

parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.label: Subscriptions
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| extend selected= iff(name contains "{InternalWSs}", true, false) 
| project subscriptionId, selected
| summarize selected= max(selected) by subscriptionId

parameters.name: SAPWorkspace
parameters.label: SAP Workspace
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| project value =id, label = name, selected = iff(name =~ '{InternalWSs}', true, false)
| order by selected desc

parameters.name: ADWorkspace
parameters.label: Azure audit and activity Workspace
parameters.description: Use this selector when the Azure audit and signin logs are on a different workspace than the one SAP is on

parameters.name: TimeRange
parameters.description: Select the time range that will be used for the query's
parameters.label: Time Range

parameters.name: SystemRoles
parameters.label: System Roles
parameters.query:
let EmptySystems= datatable ( SystemID: string, SystemID_s:string , SystemUsage: string, SystemRole: string, Count: long  )['All Systems', 'All Systems', 'All System Usage', 'All System Roles', 1];
let AuditSystems = union isfuzzy= true *ABAPAuditLog_CL, (EmptySystems| project SystemID, SystemID_s) | summarize by SystemID= SystemID_s;
AuditSystems
| lookup kind=inner (SAPSystems() | union isfuzzy=true EmptySystems) on SystemID
| extend ranked= array_sum(to_utf8(SystemRole))
| summarize Ranked= any(ranked) by SystemRole
| order by Ranked desc
| serialize Rank = row_number()
| project value= SystemRole, label= strcat('💎', SystemRole), selected= iff(Rank==1, true, false)

parameters.name: SystemUsage
parameters.label: System Usage
parameters.query:
let EmptySystems= datatable ( SystemID: string, SystemID_s:string , SystemUsage: string, SystemRole: string, Count: long  )['All Systems', 'All Systems', 'All Usage Types', 'All System Roles', 1];
let AuditSystems = union isfuzzy= true *ABAPAuditLog_CL, (EmptySystems| project SystemID, SystemID_s, SystemUsage) | summarize by SystemID= SystemID_s, SystemUsage;
AuditSystems
| lookup (SAPSystems(SelectedSystemRoles=dynamic("{SystemRoles}"))) on SystemID
| extend SystemUsage= strcat(SystemUsage, SystemUsage1)
| extend ranked= array_sum(to_utf8(SystemUsage))
| summarize Ranked= any(ranked) by SystemUsage
| where isnotempty(SystemUsage)
| order by Ranked desc
| serialize Rank = row_number()
//| where isnotempty(SystemUsage) or SystemID == 'All Systems'
| project value= SystemUsage, label= strcat('🌐', SystemUsage), selected= iff(Rank==1, true, false)

parameters.name: Systems
NormallyFailingUsers
parameters.query:
let FailedAuitClasses= dynamic(["AU2", "AUL", "AU6", "AUM"]); // "Failed Dialog Logon", "Failed RFC call", "RFC/CPIC logon failed", "User Locked"
let SelectedSystems= SAPSystems(SelectedSystemRoles=dynamic("{SystemRoles}")
, SelectedSystems=todynamic("[{Systems}]")
, SelectedSystemUsage= dynamic("{SystemUsage}")) | project SystemID;
//SelectedSystems
SAPAuditLog
| where SystemID in(SelectedSystems)
| where  MessageID in (FailedAuitClasses)
| where isnotempty( User)
| make-series FailedCountArray= count() default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 6h by User
//, SystemID
| extend FailedAnomalies= series_decompose_anomalies(FailedCountArray, Threshold=2, Test_point= 1)
| where array_index_of(FailedAnomalies,1)>= 0
| summarize  Users2Exclude= make_set(User)

parameters.name: AzureSuspiciousUsers
parameters.description: list of suspicious azure audit and login users

content.json: You are currently running in demo mode. System IDs and fields containing personally identifiable information are anonymized.

content.query:
SAPSystems(SelectedSystemRoles=dynamic("{SystemRoles}")
, SelectedSystems=todynamic("[{Systems}]")
, SelectedSystemUsage= dynamic("{SystemUsage}")) 
| project SystemID
| extend SystemID= iff({DemoMode}, substring(hash_sha1(SystemID), 0, 3), SystemID)
| summarize Systems= makeset(SystemID,50)
| project text= strcat("", "Selected SAP Systems: ", translate('"[]', ' ', tostring(Systems)))

let SystemsConfiguration= (SAPAuditLog| summarize Count= count() by SystemID) | lookup SAPSystems() on SystemID | extend SystemID= iff({DemoMode}, substring(hash_sha1(SystemID), 0, 3), SystemID); SystemsConfiguration | where isempty(SystemRole) or isempty( SystemUsage) | summarize Systems= make_set(SystemID, 50), EventsMissed= sum(Count) | where array_length( Systems)> 0 | extend Description1 = strcat('⚠️', "**The following SAP ",iff(array_length( Systems)> 1, "Systems are not", "System is not")," condigured properly in sentinel: ", iff(array_length( Systems)> 1,Systems, Systems[0]),".**
") | extend Description2 = strcat("Please update the 'SAP - Systems' watchlist to include these systems and ensure proper security coverage",".
") | extend Description3 = strcat("Number of events not covered is ", EventsMissed,".") | project strcat(Description1, Description2, Description3)
content.noDataMessage: All SAP Systems are Configured Properly in Sentinel

content.json:
----
## Logon Analysis

Logon activities of the SAP landscape

content.query:
let SelectedSystems= SAPSystems(SelectedSystemRoles=dynamic("{SystemRoles}")
, SelectedSystems=todynamic("[{Systems}]")
, SelectedSystemUsage= dynamic("{SystemUsage}")) | project SystemID;
//SelectedSystems
SAPAuditLog
| where SystemID in(SelectedSystems)
| where MessageClass contains_cs "Logon"
| summarize UniqueUsers= dcount(User) by SystemID
//| order by UniqueUsers desc
| top-nested 18 of SystemID with others="Other Systems" by UniqueUsers= sum(UniqueUsers)
| join (SAPAuditLog
| where SystemID in(SelectedSystems)
| where MessageClass contains_cs "Logon"
| make-series TrendList = dcount(User) on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, 4h) by SystemID 
) on SystemID
| extend SystemID= iff({DemoMode}, substring(hash_sha1(SystemID), 0, 3), SystemID)
| extend Systemlabel= strcat('🛡️', SystemID)
content.title: Unique User Logons Per System
Login types trend

content.query:
let SuccessAuitClasses= dynamic(["AU1", "AUK", "AU5"]); // "User logged on", "Successful RFC", "RFC/CPIC logon"
let FailedAuitClasses= dynamic(["AU2", "AUL", "AU6", "AUM"]); // "Failed Dialog Logon", "Failed RFC call", "RFC/CPIC logon failed", "User Locked"
let SelectedSystems= SAPSystems(SelectedSystemRoles=dynamic("{SystemRoles}")
, SelectedSystems=todynamic("[{Systems}]")
, SelectedSystemUsage= dynamic("{SystemUsage}")) | project SystemID;
//SelectedSystems
SAPAuditLog
| where SystemID in(SelectedSystems)
| where  MessageID in (array_concat(SuccessAuitClasses, FailedAuitClasses))
| summarize Count= count() by MessageID, User, TimeGenerated= bin(TimeGenerated, 4h)
| extend Status= iff( SuccessAuitClasses has MessageID, "Success", "Failure")
| summarize UniqueUsers= dcount(User), Count= sum(Count) by Status, TimeGenerated
| order by Status asc
content.title: Logon failures Vs. success by unique users- trend

content.json:
----
## Logon Failures

An overview of failed logon attempts. 

### Anomaly detection- filtering out noisy failed logon attempts
We use anomaly detection methods to determine which users fail to logon frequently, e.g., failures related to a scheduled job running with out-of-date user credentials.

You have the option to restrict out repeated failures, by selecting the "⚠️Anomalous only" option, allowing you to focus on those out of the ordinary failed logon attempts.

### Logon failure rate
Defined as the proportion of unique users that failed to logon out of the entire logon population (failed + succeeded).
In this section, you get a look into the logon failure rate per SAP system. 

Selecting a system will detail all relevant failed logon attempts, respecting the selection made using the "Failed logons" crieria ("All" or "⚠️Anomalous only" ).

parameters.name: FailedLogons
parameters.label: Failed logons
parameters.jsonData: [{ "value": ["Anomalous logon failures", "Frequent logon failures"], "label": "All" , "selected":true }, { "value": "Anomalous logon failures", "label": "⚠️Anomalous only"}]

content.query:
let FailedAuitClasses= dynamic(["AU2", "AUL", "AU6", "AUM"]);
let SelectedSystems= SAPSystems(SelectedSystemRoles=dynamic("{SystemRoles}")
, SelectedSystems=todynamic("[{Systems}]")
, SelectedSystemUsage= dynamic("{SystemUsage}")) | project SystemID;
//SelectedSystems
SAPAuditLog
| where SystemID in(SelectedSystems)
| where MessageID in (FailedAuitClasses)
| summarize UniqueUsers= dcount(User) by SystemID
//| order by UniqueUsers desc
| top-nested 18 of SystemID with others="Other Systems" by UniqueUsers= sum(UniqueUsers)
| join (SAPAuditLog
| where SystemID in(SelectedSystems)
| where MessageID in (FailedAuitClasses)
| make-series FailedCountArray = dcount(User) on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, 4h) by SystemID 
| extend FailedAnomalies= series_decompose_anomalies(FailedCountArray, Threshold=2, Test_point= 1)
| extend FailedAnomaly= array_index_of(FailedAnomalies,1)>= 0
| extend Anomaly = iff(FailedAnomaly, 'Anomalous logon failures', 'Frequent logon failures')
| where  ("{FailedLogons}") contains Anomaly
) on SystemID
| extend SystemID= iff({DemoMode}, substring(hash_sha1(SystemID), 0, 3), SystemID)
| extend Systemlabel= strcat('🛡️', SystemID)
content.title: Unique User failed logons per SAP system

content.query:
let FailedAuitClasses= dynamic(["AU2", "AUL", "AU6", "AUM"]); // "Failed Dialog Logon", "Failed RFC call", "RFC/CPIC logon failed", "User Locked"
let UsersEmail= SAPUsersEmail
| summarize Email= make_set_if(Email,  Email contains_cs "@", 10)[0] by User;
let UsersEventCount= (SecurityAlert
    | summarize hint.strategy = shuffle arg_max(TimeGenerated, Entities), NumberOfUpdates = count() by SystemAlertId
    | mv-expand todynamic(Entities)
    | where Entities["Type"] =~ "account"
    | where isnotempty( Entities["Name"]) and isnotempty( Entities["UPNSuffix"])
    | project UserPrincipalName = strcat(tolower(Entities["Name"]), "@", tolower(Entities["UPNSuffix"])), AlertID= SystemAlertId
    | join kind=inner (SecurityIncident | mv-expand AlertID= AlertIds to typeof(string ) | project AlertID, IncidentName) on AlertID
| summarize IncidentCount= dcount(IncidentName, 2) , AlertCount= dcount(AlertID, 2) by Email= UserPrincipalName);
let NormallyFailingUsers= todynamic(""{NormallyFailingUsers}"");
let RiskyADUsers= todynamic(""{AzureSuspiciousUsers}"");
let SelectedSystems= SAPSystems(SelectedSystemRoles=dynamic("{SystemRoles}")
, SelectedSystems=todynamic("[{Systems}]")
, SelectedSystemUsage= dynamic("{SystemUsage}")) | project SystemID;
SAPAuditLog
| where SystemID in(SelectedSystems)
| where  MessageID in (FailedAuitClasses)
| where isnotempty( User)
| make-series FailedCountArray= count() default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 6h by User
| extend FailedAnomalies= series_decompose_anomalies(FailedCountArray, Threshold=2, Test_point= 1)
| extend FailedAnomaly= array_index_of(FailedAnomalies,1)>= 0
| extend Anomaly = iff(FailedAnomaly, 'Anomalous logon failures', 'Frequent logon failures')
| where  ("{FailedLogons}") contains Anomaly
| project User
, FailedCountArray, FailedAnomalies, TimeGenerated, Anomaly
| extend AnomalousFailedLogon = iff(User in(NormallyFailingUsers), 'Anomalous logon failures', 'Frequent logon failures')
| lookup UsersEmail on User
//| extend Email = iff(isempty(Email), User, Email)
| extend Email = iff(isempty(Email), iff({DemoMode}, 'pdemo@seccxpninja.onmicrosoft.com', User), tolower(Email))
| extend RiskyADUser = iff(Email in(RiskyADUsers), 'High risk AD user', '')
| extend UserAnom= iff({DemoMode}, substring(hash_sha1(User), 0, 12), User)
| extend EmailAnom= iff({DemoMode}, strcat(substring(hash_sha1(User), 0, 12), '@seccxpninja.onmicrosoft.com' ), Email)
| project User, UserAnom, FailedCountArray, FailedAnomalies, Anomaly, EmailAnom, Email, RiskyADUser
| lookup UsersEventCount on Email
| order by RiskyADUser desc, IncidentCount desc, User asc
content.title: Anomalous logon failures- select a line to search for related events

items.name: Anomalous logon failures with AD risk indications

content.query:
let EntityToCheck= "{EntityToCheck}";
let EmptySet= datatable(AlertName:string) ["No incidents found"];
SecurityIncident
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,CreatedTime,Status, Severity, Owner, AdditionalData, IncidentUrl, Comments, Classification,ClassificationReason, ClassificationComment,Labels, Title, AlertIds) by IncidentNumber
| where array_length(AlertIds) > 0
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo), IncidentCreated = format_datetime(CreatedTime,'yy-MM-dd HH:mm')
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0]))
| extend Tags = extract_all('labelName":"(.*?)"',tostring(Labels))
| extend Owner = case(tostring(Owner)=="", "Unassigned",tostring(Owner)), Products = strcat_array(AdditionalData.alertProductNames, ", "), Alerts = tostring(AdditionalData.alertsCount), Bookmarks = tostring(AdditionalData.bookmarksCount), Comments = tostring(AdditionalData.commentsCount), Tactics = strcat_array(AdditionalData.tactics, ", "), Labels = strcat_array(Tags, ", ")
| mv-expand AlertIds to typeof(string)
| join kind=inner 
(SecurityAlert | search Entities:EntityToCheck
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,AlertName, Description, AlertType, Entities) by SystemAlertId) on $left.AlertIds == $right.SystemAlertId
| extend HoursAgo= datetime_diff('Hour',now(), TimeGenerated)
| project AlertName, IncidentUrl, HoursAgo, TimeGenerated, Status, Severity, Owner, Entities, User= "{EntityToCheck}"
| order by TimeGenerated
content.title: Incidents/ alerts overiew for user {AnomEntityToCheck}
content.noDataMessage: Couldn't find any incidents/ alerts for user

content.title: Azure audit and sigin risks for user {AnomEntityToCheck}
content.noDataMessage: No Azure AD and SignIns anomalies found

content.query:
let NormallyFailingUsers= todynamic(""{NormallyFailingUsers}"");
let SuccessAuitClasses= dynamic(["AU1", "AUK", "AU5"]); // "User logged on", "Successful RFC", "RFC/CPIC logon"
let FailedAuitClasses= dynamic(["AU2", "AUL", "AU6", "AUM"]); // "Failed Dialog Logon", "Failed RFC call", "RFC/CPIC logon failed", "User Locked"
let SelectedSystems= SAPSystems(SelectedSystemRoles=dynamic("{SystemRoles}")
, SelectedSystems=todynamic("[{Systems}]")
, SelectedSystemUsage= dynamic("{SystemUsage}")) | project SystemID, SystemRole;
//SelectedSystems
SAPAuditLog
| where  MessageID in (array_concat(SuccessAuitClasses, FailedAuitClasses))
| summarize Count= count() by MessageID, User, SystemID
| lookup SelectedSystems on SystemID
| extend Status= iff( SuccessAuitClasses has MessageID, "Success", "Failure")
| extend SystemRole= iff(isempty(SystemRole), '⚠️Misconfigured Systems',SystemRole)
| extend Anomaly = iff(User in(NormallyFailingUsers), 'Anomalous logon failures', 'Frequent logon failures')
| where  ("{FailedLogons}") contains Anomaly
| summarize UniqueUsersSucess= dcountif(User, Status == "Success", 1), CountSuccess= sumif(Count, Status == "Success"),
            UniqueUsersFail= dcountif(User, Status == "Failure", 1), CountFail= sumif(Count, Status == "Failure")
by SystemID, SystemRole
| extend UniqueFailRate= 100.0*UniqueUsersFail/(UniqueUsersSucess+UniqueUsersFail)
| extend CountFailRate= 100.0*CountFail/(CountSuccess+CountFail)
| extend SystemID2= iff({DemoMode}, substring(hash_sha1(SystemID), 0, 3), SystemID)
content.title: Logon failure rate per system- click on a cell for a detailed report

content.query:
let NormallyFailingUsers= todynamic(""{NormallyFailingUsers}"");
let DataTypes = materialize(SAPGetDataTypes());
let FailedAuitClasses= dynamic(["AU2", "AUL", "AU6", "AUM"]); // "Failed Dialog Logon", "Failed RFC call", "RFC/CPIC logon failed", "User Locked"
SAPAuditLog
| where  MessageID in (FailedAuitClasses)
| where SystemID == "{SystemIDFromHive}"
| summarize Count= count(), MessageText= any(MessageText) by MessageID, User, SystemID, TimeGenerated= startofday(bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)), LogonTypes= Variable1, Reasons= Variable2, LogonMethods= Variable3
| extend Anomaly = iff(User in(NormallyFailingUsers), 'Anomalous logon failures', 'Frequent logon failures')
| where  ("{FailedLogons}") contains Anomaly
| lookup (DataTypes | where DataType == "LogonFailureCause"| project Key, LogonFailureCause= Value) on $left.Reasons == $right.Key
| lookup (DataTypes | where DataType == "LogonType"| project Key, LogonType= Value) on $left.LogonTypes == $right.Key
| lookup (DataTypes | where DataType == "LogonMethod"| project Key, LogonMethod= Value) on $left.LogonMethods == $right.Key
| extend User= iff({DemoMode}, substring(hash_sha1(User), 0, 12), User)
| project User, LogonType, LogonMethod, LogonFailureCause, Details= strcat("User ", User, " has failed to logon by ", LogonMethod, ". A ", LogonType, " has failed for ", LogonFailureCause )
, Count, FormattedDate= format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'yy-MM-dd')
| extend CountPerDay= strcat(Count, ' Times on ', FormattedDate)
content.title: Failed logons for system {SystemID2FromHive}
content.noDataMessage: Click on a system from the hive to see failed logons

content.query:
let DataTypes = materialize(SAPGetDataTypes());
let SelectedSystems= SAPSystems(SelectedSystemRoles=dynamic("{SystemRoles}")
, SelectedSystems=todynamic("[{Systems}]")
, SelectedSystemUsage= dynamic("{SystemUsage}")) | project SystemID;
let NormallyFailingUsers= todynamic(""{NormallyFailingUsers}"");
let FailedAuitClasses= dynamic(["AU2", "AUL", "AU6", "AUM"]); // "Failed Dialog Logon", "Failed RFC call", "RFC/CPIC logon failed", "User Locked"
SAPAuditLog
| where SystemID in(SelectedSystems)
| where  MessageID in (FailedAuitClasses)
| extend TimeGenerated= bin(TimeGenerated, 4h)
| extend Anomaly = iff(User in(NormallyFailingUsers), 'Anomalous logon failures', 'Frequent logon failures')
| where  ("{FailedLogons}") contains Anomaly
| summarize UniqueUsers= dcount(User), Count= count() by TimeGenerated, LogonTypes= Variable1, Reasons= Variable2, LogonMethods= Variable3
| lookup (DataTypes | where DataType == "LogonFailureCause"| project Key, LogonFailureCause= Value) on $left.Reasons == $right.Key
| lookup (DataTypes | where DataType == "LogonType"| project Key, LogonType= Value) on $left.LogonTypes == $right.Key
| lookup (DataTypes | where DataType == "LogonMethod"| project Key, LogonMethod= Value) on $left.LogonMethods == $right.Key
| project TimeGenerated, LogonFailureCause, LogonType, LogonMethod, Count, UniqueUsers
content.title: Login failure by cause

content.query:
let DataTypes = materialize(SAPGetDataTypes());
let SelectedSystems= SAPSystems(SelectedSystemRoles=dynamic("{SystemRoles}")
, SelectedSystems=todynamic("[{Systems}]")
, SelectedSystemUsage= dynamic("{SystemUsage}")) | project SystemID;
let NormallyFailingUsers= todynamic(""{NormallyFailingUsers}"");

content.json:
----
## Audit Log Alerts

An overview of the SAP Audit log events which are watched for. Configuration is based on the "SAP Dynamic Audit Log Monitor Configuration" watchlist. [ Click here for more information ](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/sap/deployment-solution-configuration#configuring-the-sap-audit-log-monitoring-analytics-rules)
### Anomaly detection- filtering out noisy automation activities
We use anomaly detection methods to determine which alerts are caused by automation, allowing us to focus on the events which are anomalous. For the following analysis, we have the "⚠️Anomalous only" option selected by default, meaning the events which are examinedt answer one of the conditions below:
1. Events marked as "Deteministic" in the "SAP Dynamic Audit Log Monitor Configuration" watchlist, and have crossed relevant thresholds and exclusion rules.
2. Events marked as "AnomaliesOnly" in the "SAP Dynamic Audit Log Monitor Configuration" watchlist, have crossed relevant thresholds and exclusion rules and flagged as anomalous by the algorithm. 

Setting the the "Audit event types" parameter to "All" will include all audit events, including such that were determined as normal by the anomaly detector.

parameters.name: AuditEventsType
parameters.label: Audit event types
parameters.jsonData: [{ "value": "Anomalous audit event", "label": "⚠️Anomalous only", "selected":true}, { "value": ["Anomalous audit event", "Normal audit event"], "label": "All" }]

content.json:
** Alert severity trends per System ID **

📈High severity
〽️ Mediun severity

content.query:
let SelectedSystems= SAPSystems(SelectedSystemRoles=dynamic("{SystemRoles}")
, SelectedSystems=todynamic("[{Systems}]")
, SelectedSystemUsage= dynamic("{SystemUsage}")) | project SystemID;
let TimeStep= 4h;
let SelectedSeverities=  dynamic(["High", "Medium"]);//can also do//let SelectedSeverities =  dynamic(["All Severities"])
let SelectedRuleTypes= dynamic([ "Deterministic", "AnomaliesOnly"]); // Rule only goes for deterministic alerting
let AuditConfiguration= materialize(SAPAuditLogConfiguration(SelectedSeverities= SelectedSeverities, SelectedRuleTypes= SelectedRuleTypes)
| where SystemID in(SelectedSystems)
| project MessageID, SystemID, RolesTagsToExclude, Severity, Threshold, RuleType, MessageText, CategoryName);
// get special users for exclusion and in-focus analysis
let SAPUsersGottenVIP = (SAPUsersGetVIP | project User = SAPUser, TagsList, SpecialFocusTagged);
let SAPUserRolesAndProfiles = (SAPUsersAssignments | project-keep User, SystemID, DirectRoles, ChildRoles, Profiles | summarize RolesAndProfiles = make_set(array_concat(DirectRoles, ChildRoles, Profiles), 120) by User, SystemID);
SAPAuditLog
| where SystemID in(SelectedSystems)
| where isnotempty( User)
| where AlertSeverityText != "Low"
| where MessageID in ((AuditConfiguration | summarize count() by MessageID))
| lookup kind=inner (AuditConfiguration| project SystemID, MessageID, Severity, Threshold  ) on
$left.MessageID == $right.MessageID
,$left.SystemID == $right.SystemID
| where SelectedSeverities contains Severity
| make-series AuditEventsCounts= count() default=0 on TimeGenerated from startofday({TimeRange:start}) to {TimeRange:end} 
step TimeStep by SystemID, MessageID, User, Threshold
| extend crossedThreshold= series_greater(AuditEventsCounts, repeat(Threshold* TimeStep/1h, array_length(AuditEventsCounts)) )
| where array_sum(crossedThreshold) > 0
| extend crossedThreshold = array_iif(crossedThreshold,repeat(1, array_length(AuditEventsCounts)) , repeat(0, array_length(AuditEventsCounts)))
| lookup SAPUsersGottenVIP on User
| lookup SAPUserRolesAndProfiles on User, SystemID
| lookup (AuditConfiguration | project-keep SystemID, MessageID, RuleType, RolesTagsToExclude, MessageText, CategoryName, Severity) on MessageID, SystemID
| extend RolesProfilesAndTags = array_concat(RolesAndProfiles, TagsList)
| extend TagsIntersect = set_intersect(split(RolesTagsToExclude,";"), RolesProfilesAndTags)
| extend IntersectionSize = array_length(TagsIntersect)
// keep only non-excluded users that are not under "Special Focus"
| where IntersectionSize == 0 or isempty(IntersectionSize) or SpecialFocusTagged == true
| extend Anomalies= series_decompose_anomalies(AuditEventsCounts, Threshold=4, Test_point= 1)
| extend Anomaly= array_index_of(Anomalies,1)>= 0
| extend AnomalSeriesIndicator = iff(RuleType=="Deterministic", "Deterministic threshold crossed", iff(Anomaly, 'Anomalous audit event', 'Normal audit event'))
| extend UserMessageSystemCount= 1
| mv-expand Anomalies to typeof(double), TimeGenerated to typeof(datetime), crossedThreshold to typeof(int )
| where (crossedThreshold > 0) and (( RuleType=="Deterministic") or ( RuleType== "AnomaliesOnly" and (Anomalies > 0 or "{AuditEventsType}" contains "All")))
| extend AnomalPointIndicator = iff(RuleType=="Deterministic", "Deterministic threshold crossed", "Anomalous audit event")
| make-series  AlertCountsHigh= countif(Severity == "High") default=0, AlertCountsMedium= countif(Severity == "Medium") default=0 on TimeGenerated from startofday({TimeRange:start}) to {TimeRange:end} 
step TimeStep by SystemID
| extend SystemID= iff({DemoMode}, substring(hash_sha1(SystemID), 0, 3), SystemID)
| extend Systemlabel= strcat('🛡️', SystemID)
//| extend left= "High"
//| extend right= "Medium"
content.title: Alert severity trends per System ID

content.query:
let UsersEmail= SAPUsersEmail
| summarize Email= make_set_if(Email,  Email contains_cs "@", 10)[0] by User;
let UsersEventCount= (SecurityAlert
    | summarize hint.strategy = shuffle arg_max(TimeGenerated, Entities), NumberOfUpdates = count() by SystemAlertId
    | mv-expand todynamic(Entities)
    | where Entities["Type"] =~ "account"
    | where isnotempty( Entities["Name"]) and isnotempty( Entities["UPNSuffix"])
    | project UserPrincipalName = strcat(tolower(Entities["Name"]), "@", tolower(Entities["UPNSuffix"])), AlertID= SystemAlertId
    | join kind=inner (SecurityIncident | mv-expand AlertID= AlertIds to typeof(string ) | project AlertID, IncidentName) on AlertID
| summarize IncidentCount= dcount(IncidentName, 2) , AlertCount= dcount(AlertID, 2) by Email= UserPrincipalName);
let RiskyADUsers= todynamic(""{AzureSuspiciousUsers}"");
let SelectedSystems= SAPSystems(SelectedSystemRoles=dynamic("{SystemRoles}")
, SelectedSystems=todynamic("[{Systems}]")
, SelectedSystemUsage= dynamic("{SystemUsage}")) | project SystemID;
let TimeStep= 4h;
let SelectedSeverities=  dynamic(["High", "Medium"]);//can also do//let SelectedSeverities =  dynamic(["All Severities"])
let SelectedRuleTypes= dynamic([ "Deterministic", "AnomaliesOnly"]); // Rule only goes for deterministic alerting
let AuditConfiguration= materialize(SAPAuditLogConfiguration(SelectedSeverities= SelectedSeverities, SelectedRuleTypes= SelectedRuleTypes)
| where SystemID in(SelectedSystems)
| project MessageID, SystemID, RolesTagsToExclude, Severity, Threshold, RuleType, MessageText, CategoryName);
// get special users for exclusion and in-focus analysis
let SAPUsersGottenVIP = (SAPUsersGetVIP | project User = SAPUser, TagsList, SpecialFocusTagged);
let SAPUserRolesAndProfiles = (SAPUsersAssignments | project-keep User, SystemID, DirectRoles, ChildRoles, Profiles | summarize RolesAndProfiles = make_set(array_concat(DirectRoles, ChildRoles, Profiles), 120) by User, SystemID);
SAPAuditLog
| where SystemID in(SelectedSystems)
| where isnotempty( User)
| where AlertSeverityText != "Low"
| where MessageID in ((AuditConfiguration | summarize count() by MessageID))
| lookup kind=inner (AuditConfiguration| project SystemID, MessageID, Severity, Threshold  ) on
$left.MessageID == $right.MessageID
,$left.SystemID == $right.SystemID
| where SelectedSeverities contains Severity
| make-series AuditEventsCounts= count() default=0 on TimeGenerated from startofday({TimeRange:start}) to {TimeRange:end} 
step TimeStep by SystemID, MessageID, User, Threshold
| extend crossedThreshold= series_greater(AuditEventsCounts, repeat(Threshold* TimeStep/1h, array_length(AuditEventsCounts)) )
| where array_sum(crossedThreshold) > 0
| extend crossedThreshold = array_iif(crossedThreshold,repeat(1, array_length(AuditEventsCounts)) , repeat(0, array_length(AuditEventsCounts)))
| lookup SAPUsersGottenVIP on User
| lookup SAPUserRolesAndProfiles on User, SystemID
| lookup (AuditConfiguration | project-keep SystemID, MessageID, RuleType, RolesTagsToExclude, MessageText, CategoryName, Severity) on MessageID, SystemID
| extend RolesProfilesAndTags = array_concat(RolesAndProfiles, TagsList)
| extend TagsIntersect = set_intersect(split(RolesTagsToExclude,";"), RolesProfilesAndTags)
| extend IntersectionSize = array_length(TagsIntersect)
// keep only non-excluded users that are not under "Special Focus"
| where IntersectionSize == 0 or isempty(IntersectionSize) or SpecialFocusTagged == true
| extend Anomalies= series_decompose_anomalies(AuditEventsCounts, Threshold=4, Test_point= 1)
| extend Anomaly= array_index_of(Anomalies,1)>= 0
| extend AnomalSeriesIndicator = iff(RuleType=="Deterministic", "Deterministic threshold crossed", iff(Anomaly, 'Anomalous audit event', 'Normal audit event'))
| extend UserMessageSystemCount= 1
| mv-expand Anomalies to typeof(double), TimeGenerated to typeof(datetime), crossedThreshold to typeof(int )
| where (crossedThreshold > 0) and (( RuleType=="Deterministic") or ( RuleType== "AnomaliesOnly" and (Anomalies > 0 or "{AuditEventsType}" contains "All")))
| extend AnomalPointIndicator = iff(RuleType=="Deterministic", "Deterministic threshold crossed", "Anomalous audit event")
| make-series  AlertCountsHigh= countif(Severity == "High") default=0, AlertCountsMedium= countif(Severity == "Medium") default=0 on TimeGenerated from startofday({TimeRange:start}) to {TimeRange:end} 
step TimeStep by User
| lookup UsersEmail on User
| extend Email = iff(isempty(Email), User, Email)
| extend Email = iff(isempty(Email), iff({DemoMode}, 'pdemo@seccxpninja.onmicrosoft.com', User), tolower(Email))
| extend RiskyADUser = iff(Email in(RiskyADUsers), 'High risk AD user', '')
| extend SumOfHigh = array_sum(AlertCountsHigh)*2 + array_sum(AlertCountsMedium)
| order by RiskyADUser desc, SumOfHigh desc
| extend UserAnom= iff({DemoMode}, substring(hash_sha1(User), 0, 12), User)
| extend EmailAnom= iff({DemoMode}, strcat(substring(hash_sha1(User), 0, 12), '@seccxpninja.onmicrosoft.com' ), Email)
| project User, UserAnom, AlertCountsHigh , AlertCountsMedium, EmailAnom, Email, RiskyADUser
| lookup UsersEventCount on Email
| order by RiskyADUser desc, IncidentCount desc, User asc
content.title: Audit trend per user- select a line to see more details

content.query:
let EntityToCheck= "{EntityToCheck}";
let EmptySet= datatable(AlertName:string) ["No incidents found"];
SecurityIncident
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,CreatedTime,Status, Severity, Owner, AdditionalData, IncidentUrl, Comments, Classification,ClassificationReason, ClassificationComment,Labels, Title, AlertIds) by IncidentNumber
| where array_length(AlertIds) > 0
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo), IncidentCreated = format_datetime(CreatedTime,'yy-MM-dd HH:mm')
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0]))
| extend Tags = extract_all('labelName":"(.*?)"',tostring(Labels))
| extend Owner = case(tostring(Owner)=="", "Unassigned",tostring(Owner)), Products = strcat_array(AdditionalData.alertProductNames, ", "), Alerts = tostring(AdditionalData.alertsCount), Bookmarks = tostring(AdditionalData.bookmarksCount), Comments = tostring(AdditionalData.commentsCount), Tactics = strcat_array(AdditionalData.tactics, ", "), Labels = strcat_array(Tags, ", ")
| mv-expand AlertIds to typeof(string)
| join kind=inner 
(SecurityAlert | search Entities:EntityToCheck
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,AlertName, Description, AlertType, Entities) by SystemAlertId) on $left.AlertIds == $right.SystemAlertId
| extend HoursAgo= datetime_diff('Hour',now(), TimeGenerated)
| project AlertName, IncidentUrl, HoursAgo, TimeGenerated, Status, Severity, Owner, Entities, User= "{EntityToCheckAnom}"
| order by TimeGenerated
content.title: Incidents/ alerts overiew for user {EntityToCheckAnom}
content.noDataMessage: Couldn't find any incidents/ alerts for user

content.title: Azure audit and sigin risks for user {EntityToCheckAnom}
content.noDataMessage: No Azure AD and SignIns anomalies found

content.query:
let SelectedSystems= SAPSystems(SelectedSystemRoles=dynamic("{SystemRoles}")
, SelectedSystems=todynamic("[{Systems}]")
, SelectedSystemUsage= dynamic("{SystemUsage}")) | project SystemID, SystemRole;
let TimeStep= 4h;
let SelectedSeverities=  dynamic(["High", "Medium"]);//can also do//let SelectedSeverities =  dynamic(["All Severities"])
let SelectedRuleTypes= dynamic([ "Deterministic", "AnomaliesOnly"]); // Rule only goes for deterministic alerting
let AuditConfiguration= materialize(SAPAuditLogConfiguration(SelectedSeverities= SelectedSeverities, SelectedRuleTypes= SelectedRuleTypes)
| where SystemID in((SelectedSystems | project SystemID))
| project MessageID, SystemID, RolesTagsToExclude, Severity, Threshold, RuleType);
// get special users for exclusion and in-focus analysis
let SAPUsersGottenVIP = (SAPUsersGetVIP | project User = SAPUser, TagsList, SpecialFocusTagged);
let SAPUserRolesAndProfiles = (SAPUsersAssignments | project-keep User, SystemID, DirectRoles, ChildRoles, Profiles | summarize RolesAndProfiles = make_set(array_concat(DirectRoles, ChildRoles, Profiles), 120) by User, SystemID);
let RelevantEvents =SAPAuditLog
| where SystemID in((SelectedSystems | project SystemID))
| where isnotempty( User)
| where AlertSeverityText != "Low"
| where MessageID in ((AuditConfiguration | summarize count() by MessageID))
| lookup kind=inner (AuditConfiguration| project SystemID, MessageID, Severity, Threshold  ) on
$left.MessageID == $right.MessageID
,$left.SystemID == $right.SystemID
| where SelectedSeverities contains Severity
| make-series AuditEventsCounts= count() default=0 on TimeGenerated from startofday({TimeRange:start}) to {TimeRange:end} 
step TimeStep by SystemID, MessageID, User, Threshold;
RelevantEvents 
| extend crossedThreshold= series_greater(AuditEventsCounts, repeat(Threshold* TimeStep/1h, array_length(AuditEventsCounts)) )
| where array_sum(crossedThreshold) > 0
| extend crossedThreshold = array_iif(crossedThreshold,repeat(1, array_length(AuditEventsCounts)) , repeat(0, array_length(AuditEventsCounts)))
| lookup SAPUsersGottenVIP on User
| lookup SAPUserRolesAndProfiles on User, SystemID
| lookup (AuditConfiguration | project-keep SystemID, MessageID, RuleType, RolesTagsToExclude,  Severity) on MessageID, SystemID
| extend RolesProfilesAndTags = array_concat(RolesAndProfiles, TagsList)
| extend TagsIntersect = set_intersect(split(RolesTagsToExclude,";"), RolesProfilesAndTags)
| extend IntersectionSize = array_length(TagsIntersect)
// keep only non-excluded users that are not under "Special Focus"
| where IntersectionSize == 0 or isempty(IntersectionSize) or SpecialFocusTagged == true
| extend Anomalies= series_decompose_anomalies(AuditEventsCounts, Threshold=4, Test_point= 1)
| extend Anomaly= array_index_of(Anomalies,1)>= 0
| extend AnomalSeriesIndicator = iff(RuleType=="Deterministic", "Deterministic threshold crossed", iff(Anomaly, 'Anomalous audit event', 'Normal audit event'))
| mv-expand Anomalies to typeof(double), TimeGenerated to typeof(datetime), crossedThreshold to typeof(int )
| where (crossedThreshold > 0) and (( RuleType=="Deterministic") or ( RuleType== "AnomaliesOnly" and (Anomalies > 0 or "{AuditEventsType}" contains "All")))
| summarize SuspiciousScore= floor((countif(Severity=="High") + countif(Severity=="Medium")*0.5),1) by SystemID
| join kind= fullouter (RelevantEvents | summarize ActivityScore= count() by SystemID) on SystemID
| lookup SelectedSystems on SystemID
| extend SystemRole= iff(isempty(SystemRole), '⚠️Misconfigured Systems',SystemRole)
| extend RiskScore = floor(100*(SuspiciousScore/ ActivityScore),1)
| project SystemID= SystemID1, SystemRole, SuspiciousScore, ActivityScore, RiskScore
| extend SAPUserToCheckAlerts = 'No User Selected'
| extend SystemID2= iff({DemoMode}, substring(hash_sha1(SystemID), 0, 3), SystemID)
content.title: Risk score per system- select a system to search for events

content.query:
let SelectedSystems= SAPSystems(SelectedSystemRoles=dynamic("{SystemRoles}")
, SelectedSystems=todynamic("[{Systems}]")
, SelectedSystemUsage= dynamic("{SystemUsage}")) | project SystemID, SystemRole;
let TimeStep= 4h;
let SelectedSeverities=  dynamic(["High", "Medium"]);//can also do//let SelectedSeverities =  dynamic(["All Severities"])
let SelectedRuleTypes= dynamic([ "Deterministic", "AnomaliesOnly"]); // Rule only goes for deterministic alerting
let AuditConfiguration= materialize(SAPAuditLogConfiguration(SelectedSeverities= SelectedSeverities, SelectedRuleTypes= SelectedRuleTypes)
| where SystemID in((SelectedSystems | project SystemID))
| project MessageID, SystemID, RolesTagsToExclude, Severity, Threshold, RuleType, CategoryName, DetailedDescription);
// get special users for exclusion and in-focus analysis
let SAPUsersGottenVIP = (SAPUsersGetVIP | project User = SAPUser, TagsList, SpecialFocusTagged);
let SAPUserRolesAndProfiles = (SAPUsersAssignments | project-keep User, SystemID, DirectRoles, ChildRoles, Profiles | summarize RolesAndProfiles = make_set(array_concat(DirectRoles, ChildRoles, Profiles), 120) by User, SystemID);
let UsersEmail= SAPUsersEmail
| summarize Email= make_set_if(Email,  Email contains_cs "@", 10)[0] by User;
let RelevantEvents =SAPAuditLog
| where SystemID == "{SystemIDFromHiveAlerts}"
| where isnotempty( User)
| where AlertSeverityText != "Low"
| where MessageID in ((AuditConfiguration | summarize count() by MessageID))
| lookup kind=inner (AuditConfiguration| project SystemID, MessageID, Severity, Threshold  ) on
$left.MessageID == $right.MessageID
,$left.SystemID == $right.SystemID
| where SelectedSeverities contains Severity
| make-series AuditEventsCounts= count() default=0 on TimeGenerated from startofday({TimeRange:start}) to {TimeRange:end} 
step TimeStep by SystemID, MessageID, User, Threshold;
RelevantEvents 
| extend crossedThreshold= series_greater(AuditEventsCounts, repeat(Threshold* TimeStep/1h, array_length(AuditEventsCounts)) )
| where array_sum(crossedThreshold) > 0
| extend crossedThreshold = array_iif(crossedThreshold,repeat(1, array_length(AuditEventsCounts)) , repeat(0, array_length(AuditEventsCounts)))
| lookup SAPUsersGottenVIP on User
| lookup SAPUserRolesAndProfiles on User, SystemID
| lookup (AuditConfiguration | project-keep SystemID, MessageID, RuleType, RolesTagsToExclude,  Severity) on MessageID, SystemID
| extend RolesProfilesAndTags = array_concat(RolesAndProfiles, TagsList)
| extend TagsIntersect = set_intersect(split(RolesTagsToExclude,";"), RolesProfilesAndTags)
| extend IntersectionSize = array_length(TagsIntersect)
// keep only non-excluded users that are not under "Special Focus"
| where IntersectionSize == 0 or isempty(IntersectionSize) or SpecialFocusTagged == true
| extend Anomalies= series_decompose_anomalies(AuditEventsCounts, Threshold=4, Test_point= 1)
| extend Anomaly= array_index_of(Anomalies,1)>= 0
| extend AnomalSeriesIndicator = iff(RuleType=="Deterministic", "Deterministic threshold crossed", iff(Anomaly, 'Anomalous audit event', 'Normal audit event'))
| mv-expand Anomalies to typeof(double), TimeGenerated to typeof(datetime), crossedThreshold to typeof(int )
| where (crossedThreshold > 0) and (( RuleType=="Deterministic") or ( RuleType== "AnomaliesOnly" and (Anomalies > 0 or "{AuditEventsType}" contains "All")))
| project User, MessageID, StartOfDay= startofday( TimeGenerated)
| join kind= rightsemi (RelevantEvents | project MessageID, User, TimeGenerated, AuditEventsCounts) on User, MessageID
| lookup (AuditConfiguration | where SystemID == "{SystemIDFromHiveAlerts}") on MessageID
| project User, AuditEventsCounts, Severity, CategoryName, DetailedDescription, ArraySum= array_sum(AuditEventsCounts)
| lookup UsersEmail on User
| extend Email = iff(isempty(Email), User, Email)
| order by ArraySum desc
| extend User= iff({DemoMode}, substring(hash_sha1(User), 0, 12), User)
| extend Email= iff({DemoMode}, strcat(substring(hash_sha1(User), 0, 12), '@seccxpninja.onmicrosoft.com' ), Email)
content.title: SAP events for system {SystemID2FromHiveAlerts}- click a line to search for relevant incidents

content.query:
let EntityToCheck= "{SAPUserToCheckAlerts}";
let EmptySet= datatable(AlertName:string) ["No incidents found"];
SecurityIncident
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,CreatedTime,Status, Severity, Owner, AdditionalData, IncidentUrl, Comments, Classification,ClassificationReason, ClassificationComment,Labels, Title, AlertIds) by IncidentNumber
| where array_length(AlertIds) > 0
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo), IncidentCreated = format_datetime(CreatedTime,'yy-MM-dd HH:mm')
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0]))
| extend Tags = extract_all('labelName":"(.*?)"',tostring(Labels))
| extend Owner = case(tostring(Owner)=="", "Unassigned",tostring(Owner)), Products = strcat_array(AdditionalData.alertProductNames, ", "), Alerts = tostring(AdditionalData.alertsCount), Bookmarks = tostring(AdditionalData.bookmarksCount), Comments = tostring(AdditionalData.commentsCount), Tactics = strcat_array(AdditionalData.tactics, ", "), Labels = strcat_array(Tags, ", ")
| mv-expand AlertIds to typeof(string)
| join kind=inner 
(SecurityAlert | search Entities:EntityToCheck
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,AlertName, Description, AlertType, Entities) by SystemAlertId) on $left.AlertIds == $right.SystemAlertId
| extend HoursAgo= datetime_diff('Hour',now(), TimeGenerated)
| project AlertName, IncidentUrl, HoursAgo, TimeGenerated, Status, Severity, Owner, Entities, User= EntityToCheck
| order by TimeGenerated

content.query:
let SelectedSystems= SAPSystems(SelectedSystemRoles=dynamic("{SystemRoles}")
, SelectedSystems=todynamic("[{Systems}]")
, SelectedSystemUsage= dynamic("{SystemUsage}")) | project SystemID, SystemRole;
let TimeStep= 4h;
let SelectedSeverities=  dynamic(["High", "Medium"]);//can also do//let SelectedSeverities =  dynamic(["All Severities"])
let SelectedRuleTypes= dynamic([ "Deterministic", "AnomaliesOnly"]); // Rule only goes for deterministic alerting
let AuditConfiguration= materialize(SAPAuditLogConfiguration(SelectedSeverities= SelectedSeverities, SelectedRuleTypes= SelectedRuleTypes)
| where SystemID in((SelectedSystems | project SystemID))
| project MessageID, SystemID, RolesTagsToExclude, Severity, Threshold, RuleType, Tactics);
// get special users for exclusion and in-focus analysis
let SAPUsersGottenVIP = (SAPUsersGetVIP | project User = SAPUser, TagsList, SpecialFocusTagged);
let SAPUserRolesAndProfiles = (SAPUsersAssignments | project-keep User, SystemID, DirectRoles, ChildRoles, Profiles | summarize RolesAndProfiles = make_set(array_concat(DirectRoles, ChildRoles, Profiles), 120) by User, SystemID);
let RelevantEvents =SAPAuditLog
| where SystemID in((SelectedSystems | project SystemID))
| where isnotempty( User)
| where AlertSeverityText != "Low"
| where MessageID in ((AuditConfiguration | summarize count() by MessageID))
| lookup kind=inner (AuditConfiguration| project SystemID, MessageID, Severity, Threshold  ) on
$left.MessageID == $right.MessageID
,$left.SystemID == $right.SystemID
| where SelectedSeverities contains Severity
| make-series AuditEventsCounts= count() default=0 on TimeGenerated from startofday({TimeRange:start}) to {TimeRange:end} 
step TimeStep by SystemID, MessageID, User, Threshold;
RelevantEvents 
| extend crossedThreshold= series_greater(AuditEventsCounts, repeat(Threshold* TimeStep/1h, array_length(AuditEventsCounts)) )
| where array_sum(crossedThreshold) > 0
| extend crossedThreshold = array_iif(crossedThreshold,repeat(1, array_length(AuditEventsCounts)) , repeat(0, array_length(AuditEventsCounts)))
| lookup SAPUsersGottenVIP on User
| lookup SAPUserRolesAndProfiles on User, SystemID
| lookup (AuditConfiguration | project-keep SystemID, MessageID, RuleType, RolesTagsToExclude,  Severity) on MessageID, SystemID
| extend RolesProfilesAndTags = array_concat(RolesAndProfiles, TagsList)
| extend TagsIntersect = set_intersect(split(RolesTagsToExclude,";"), RolesProfilesAndTags)
| extend IntersectionSize = array_length(TagsIntersect)
// keep only non-excluded users that are not under "Special Focus"
| where IntersectionSize == 0 or isempty(IntersectionSize) or SpecialFocusTagged == true
| extend Anomalies= series_decompose_anomalies(AuditEventsCounts, Threshold=4, Test_point= 1)
| extend Anomaly= array_index_of(Anomalies,1)>= 0
| extend AnomalSeriesIndicator = iff(RuleType=="Deterministic", "Deterministic threshold crossed", iff(Anomaly, 'Anomalous audit event', 'Normal audit event'))
| mv-expand Anomalies to typeof(double), TimeGenerated to typeof(datetime), crossedThreshold to typeof(int )
| where (crossedThreshold > 0) and (( RuleType=="Deterministic") or ( RuleType== "AnomaliesOnly" and (Anomalies > 0 or "{AuditEventsType}" contains "All")))
| lookup (AuditConfiguration | project-keep SystemID, MessageID, Tactics) on MessageID, SystemID
// handle multiple tactics per event
| extend SeperatedTactics= split(replace_string(Tactics, "; ", ";"), ";")
| mv-expand SeperatedTactics
// make sure first char of tactics is capitalized 
| extend Tactics= strcat(toupper(substring(tostring(SeperatedTactics), 0,1)), substring(tostring(SeperatedTactics), 1)) 
| extend Tactics= replace_string(Tactics, "Nan", "")
| summarize SuspiciousCount= floor((countif(Severity=="High") + countif(Severity=="Medium")*0.5),1) by Tactics
content.title: Event by MITRE ATT&CK® tactics

| mv-expand Anomalies to typeof(double), TimeGenerated to typeof(datetime), crossedThreshold to typeof(int )

Events by authorization group

content.query:
let SelectedSystems= SAPSystems(SelectedSystemRoles=dynamic("{SystemRoles}")
, SelectedSystems=todynamic("[{Systems}]")
, SelectedSystemUsage= dynamic("{SystemUsage}")) | project SystemID, SystemRole;
let UserAssignments= SAPUsersAssignments() | project User, UserType;
let TimeStep= 4h;
let SelectedSeverities=  dynamic(["High", "Medium"]);//can also do//let SelectedSeverities =  dynamic(["All Severities"])
let SelectedRuleTypes= dynamic([ "Deterministic", "AnomaliesOnly"]); // Rule only goes for deterministic alerting
let AuditConfiguration= materialize(SAPAuditLogConfiguration(SelectedSeverities= SelectedSeverities, SelectedRuleTypes= SelectedRuleTypes)
| where SystemID in((SelectedSystems | project SystemID))
| project MessageID, SystemID, RolesTagsToExclude, Severity, Threshold, RuleType, CategoryName);
// get special users for exclusion and in-focus analysis
let SAPUsersGottenVIP = (SAPUsersGetVIP | project User = SAPUser, TagsList, SpecialFocusTagged);
let SAPUserRolesAndProfiles = (SAPUsersAssignments | project-keep User, SystemID, DirectRoles, ChildRoles, Profiles | summarize RolesAndProfiles = make_set(array_concat(DirectRoles, ChildRoles, Profiles), 120) by User, SystemID);
let RelevantEvents =SAPAuditLog
| where SystemID in((SelectedSystems | project SystemID))
| where isnotempty( User)
| where AlertSeverityText != "Low"
| where MessageID in ((AuditConfiguration | summarize count() by MessageID))
| lookup kind=inner (AuditConfiguration| project SystemID, MessageID, Severity, Threshold  ) on
$left.MessageID == $right.MessageID
,$left.SystemID == $right.SystemID
| where SelectedSeverities contains Severity
| make-series AuditEventsCounts= count() default=0 on TimeGenerated from startofday({TimeRange:start}) to {TimeRange:end} 
step TimeStep by SystemID, MessageID, User, Threshold;
RelevantEvents 
| extend crossedThreshold= series_greater(AuditEventsCounts, repeat(Threshold* TimeStep/1h, array_length(AuditEventsCounts)) )
| where array_sum(crossedThreshold) > 0
| extend crossedThreshold = array_iif(crossedThreshold,repeat(1, array_length(AuditEventsCounts)) , repeat(0, array_length(AuditEventsCounts)))
| lookup SAPUsersGottenVIP on User
| lookup SAPUserRolesAndProfiles on User, SystemID
| lookup (AuditConfiguration | project-keep SystemID, MessageID, RuleType, RolesTagsToExclude,  Severity) on MessageID, SystemID
| extend RolesProfilesAndTags = array_concat(RolesAndProfiles, TagsList)
| extend TagsIntersect = set_intersect(split(RolesTagsToExclude,";"), RolesProfilesAndTags)
| extend IntersectionSize = array_length(TagsIntersect)
// keep only non-excluded users that are not under "Special Focus"
| where IntersectionSize == 0 or isempty(IntersectionSize) or SpecialFocusTagged == true
| extend Anomalies= series_decompose_anomalies(AuditEventsCounts, Threshold=4, Test_point= 1)
| extend Anomaly= array_index_of(Anomalies,1)>= 0
| extend AnomalSeriesIndicator = iff(RuleType=="Deterministic", "Deterministic threshold crossed", iff(Anomaly, 'Anomalous audit event', 'Normal audit event'))
| mv-expand Anomalies to typeof(double), TimeGenerated to typeof(datetime), crossedThreshold to typeof(int )
| where (crossedThreshold > 0) and (( RuleType=="Deterministic") or ( RuleType== "AnomaliesOnly" and (Anomalies > 0 or "{AuditEventsType}" contains "All")))
| lookup UserAssignments on User
| summarize SuspiciousCount= floor((countif(Severity=="High") + countif(Severity=="Medium")*0.5),1) by UserType, TimeGenerated
| lookup (SAPGetDataTypes(DataTypes= dynamic(["UserType"]))| project UserType= Key, Value) on UserType
| project UserType= iff(isempty(Value), UserType, Value), TimeGenerated, SuspiciousCount
content.title: Events by user type
